com.arcrobotics.ftclib.hardware.motors

Class MotorImplEx

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.arcrobotics.ftclib.hardware.motors.MotorEx
      • com.arcrobotics.ftclib.hardware.motors.MotorImplEx
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HardwareDevice, Motor

    public class MotorImplEx
extends MotorEx
    An extended implemented motor. Uses a MotorImpl along with the methods of MotorEx.
